Title: Relates to the residency requirements of certain public officers of political subdivisions or municipal corporations of the state
Summary: Relates to the residency requirements of certain public officers of political subdivisions or municipal corporations of the state; prohibits certain officers from being required to forego or make a payment or satisfy a levy due to such person becoming a nonresident of the political subdivision or municipal corporation of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the removal of residency penalties related to employment by any political subdivision or municipal corporation of the state
